issue.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
"accomodate" is a common misspelling; did you mean "accommodate"?
issue.errorLine1:
<string name="changelog_v3_1_0">

• Improvements to ADB OTG after initial release.

• Some UI and logic adjustments to accomodate the new otg feature.</string>
